function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High visitation to urban parks in July","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease spread","Mitigation":"Enforcing social distancing measures, promoting outdoor mask use, and limiting park capacity","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking, park capacity monitoring systems","People":"Park visitors, nearby residents, and park staff","Owner":"Local government, park management"}]}
